title: Burt's Bees Avocado Butter Pre-Shampoo Hair Treatment with Nettles and Rosemary - 4.34 fl oz
description: Rich and buttery, Burt's Bees Avocado Butter Pre-Shampoo Hair treatment moisturizes to make hair beautiful and silky. Made with Avocado Oil, the pre-wash hair treatment penetrates hair and skin giving you the moisture your hair needs without leaving an oily film. Olive and Almond Oil, Rosemary and Nettle Extracts help give your hair a beautifully glossy shine.

title: Soft 'n Style 8 oz. Spray Bottle Set / 3 Piece Set (B28SET)
description: Soft 'n Style 8 oz. Spray Bottle Set / 3 Piece Set.
